name: stringy-train-stop-redux
title: Stringy Train Stops Redux
author: PrimeEagle, based on justarandomgeek (who based it on Aladrius)
description:
Rename train stations and dispatch trains based on circuit signals.
This is an update to fix bugs and add features to string-train-stop by justarandomgeek, since that version hasn't been updated in a while.

Changes include retaining train limits and train stop colors, and retaining connections and settings for the circuit network and logistics network. Some icons were also updated.
